name: 謝東儒
objective: 本科目旨在介紹計算機系統之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括： 1.計算機系統簡介 2.資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯 3.周邊裝置及儲存體 4.程式語言與程式設計 5.軟體工程與系統開發工具 6.資料結構與演算法 7.作業系統 8.檔案與資料庫 9.資料通訊與計算機網路 10.人工智慧 11.新興技術介紹
schedule:
1 Introduction
2 Data Storage
3 Data Storage
4 Data Manipulation
5 Networking and the Internet
6 Algorithms
7 Programming Languages
8 Programming Languages
9 Midterm
10 Software Engineering
11 Data Abstractions
12 Database Systems
13 Artificial Intelligence
14 Theory of Computation
15 Theory of Computation
16 Advanced Topics (Security)
17 Advanced Topics
18 Final Exam
scorePolicy: Class participation, homework, quizzes, midterm, final exam
materials: J. Glenn Brookshear, Computer Science: An Overview (9th Edition)
